items.title: Google Partners Academy
items.description: Multi-session event booking portal for Google Partners Academy. Comprehensive language/localization asset management functionality with Google Drive integration.

items.title: BC Trucking Association
items.description: Created new Drupal site including online store built in Ubercart. Ported large member database into Drupal. Built a number of custom modules.

items.title: Fiat Chrysler EDI
items.description: Automated intergration with Fiat Chrysler production line EDI on behave of logistics vendor. Web based tools for billing audits including algortyhmic fee estimation.

items.title: Feedlife.ca
items.description: Design & Developed Wordpress site enabling client to deliver vegan cooking classes online.

items.title: Think Tank Directory
items.description: Added section to existing site. Custom Google Map with IsotopeJS implementation integrated with Drupal content.

items.title: Blast Radius
items.description: Multiple contracts working on clients such as Microsoft, SaskTel and Novartis. Highlighted by year long engagement deploying various web assets for Novartis OTC brands working remotely.

items.title: JobuTrax
items.description: Calgary based start up providing oil patch equipment operators ability to track various assets in the field, arrange transport, provide billing rates and schedule regulatory tasks.

items.title: Martin's Apple Chips
items.description: Small Drupal based marketing site. Main landing page featured a challenging combination of interface features.

items.title: Chile Avocados
items.description: Drupal marketing site that previously site received a score of 0/100 Google PageSpeed score, delivered emhanceents that received a score of 100/100.
